DOC.brief_summary: A randomize control trial ass effectiveness at-home comprehensive approach prevent fall among adult 65 year old high risk fall .
DOC.brief_title: Dane County Safety Assessment ( SAFE ) Research Study
DOC.detailed_description: A randomize control trial ass effectiveness comprehensive approach prevent fall among adult 65 year old high risk fall . This intervention include comprehensive health assessment participant 's home combine tailor risk reduction strategy individualized strength balance exercise . The study also conduct community-based program engage educate physician fall prevention . The goal study demonstrate 40 % decrease fall rate . Other expected outcome include decreased hospital nursing home stay , improved physical function , decrease fear fall .
DOC.criteria: Adults age 65+ , high risk fall , Adults < 65 year
